name: Five Ten Freerider Primeblue Cycling Shoes - Women's
description:
An essential for flat pedal riders. The Freerider is an inspired "anything, anywhere, anytime" shoe. The Primeblue edition is created from recycled plastic bottles removed from our world's oceans, so you can be psyched about clearing that double, and about your contribution to the environment.Created with yarn spun from plastic waste recovered from beaches and coastal communities, in partnership with Parley For The Oceans™.One-piece molded cupsole for cushioned comfort.Stealth® S1™ rubber outsole sticks like glue.Classic Dotty™ tread stays clean.

        Sustainability
